headline: Adidas hikes profit forecast as contains US tariff impact
summary: German sportswear giant Adidas on Tuesday raised its 2025 earnings forecast after posting record third-quarter sales and saying it had limited the impact from US tariffs.He praised the company's teams for achieving record revenue in the third quarter.

raw.headline: Adidas hikes profit forecast as contains US tariff impact

headline: ‘The Einstein of Wall Street’ says the best way to get rich is to ‘invest in stocks, not stuff’
summary: Need a starting point? Go back to your old high school, walk the halls, and look at what everyone's wearing and using.

headline: With Nike in turnaround mode, is this Adidas’ opportunity in the US?
summary: North America accounts for the majority of the revenue difference between the rivals, and Adidas CEO Bjørn Gulden is pushing the retailer to be “more American.”

raw.headline: With Nike in turnaround mode, is this Adidas’ opportunity in the US?
raw.summary: North America accounts for the majority of the revenue difference between the rivals, and Adidas CEO Bjørn Gulden is pushing the retailer to be “more American.”

headline: KeyBanc Capital Markets Turns Bullish on NIKE, Inc. (NKE) Following Fiscal Q1 2026 Earnings Beat
summary: Fisher Asset Management holds $35.00 million worth of NIKE, Inc. (NYSE:NKE) shares, helping it secure a place on our list of billionaire Ken Fisher’s 10 consumer stock picks with the highest upside potential. On October 2, 2025, KeyBanc Capital Markets upgraded NIKE, Inc. (NYSE:NKE) to “Overweight.” This upgrade reflects NIKE, Inc. (NYSE:NKE)’s fiscal Q1 2026 […]
